headline: CapStorm Launches CapStorm:AI: Self-Hosted AI for Salesforce and SQL Analytics
summary: CapStorm, a leader in secure Salesforce data management solutions, today announced the launch of CapStorm:AI, an AI-powered solution that lets users "talk to their data" using plain English. Designed for organizations seeking secure, self-hosted insights across their Salesforce and SQL environments, CapStorm:AI enables business users to ask complex data questions and receive real-time dashboards, instantly, and without writing a single line of code.

raw.headline: CapStorm Launches CapStorm:AI: Self-Hosted AI for Salesforce and SQL Analytics

headline: Finance Cloud Market Trend Analysis and Forecast Report 2025-2034, Competitive Analysis of Key Players - Salesforce, IBM, Dell, Oracle, Capgemini, Acumatica, Infosys, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google
summary: The Global Finance Cloud Market is anticipated to expand from USD 32.8 billion in 2024 to USD 240.4 billion by 2034, driven by the digital transformation in banking, insurance, and investment sectors. The shift to finance cloud solutions enhances operational efficiency, compliance, and customer experience. Innovations in AI, automation, and analytics are revolutionizing financial processes. headline: Iterable Appoints Salesforce Executive Sam Allen as New CEO to Accelerate Enterprise Growth and AI Innovation
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 08, 2025--Iterable announces the appointment of Sam Allen as Chief Executive Officer, with founder Andrew Boni transitioning to Chief Scientist.

raw.headline: Iterable Appoints Salesforce Executive Sam Allen as New CEO to Accelerate Enterprise Growth and AI Innovation

headline: Salesforce Slides 17% in Six Months: Should You Still Hold the Stock?
summary: CRM is down 17% in six months, but its dominance in the customer relationship management software space, AI focus and lower valuation may justify holding on.

raw.headline: Salesforce Slides 17% in Six Months: Should You Still Hold the Stock?

headline: AutoRABIT CodeScan Enters FedRAMP Authorization Process to Deliver Trusted, Secure DevSecOps for Government Agencies
summary: AutoRABIT, the leading DevSecOps platform for Salesforce, today announced that AutoRABIT CodeScan, its comprehensive static code analysis solution for Salesforce, is now "In Process" for Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP) authorization.

headline: Bevy Acquires Intros AI to Launch Engagement Hub to Personalize Community at Scale
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 08, 2025--Bevy acquires Intros AI to launch the Engagement Hub, an AI suite to scale personalized community engagement at the enterprise level.
